text: Xavier Ortiz (June 29, 1962 – September 7, 2020) was a Mexican actor, singer, and businessman. He was a member of the Mexican pop group Garibaldi. He was known for his roles in Journey from the Fall and the Mexican production of P.S. Your Cat Is Dead. He also played Lalo in the 2009 telenovela Un gancho al corazón. From 1999 to 2005, he was married to his Garibaldi member Patricia Manterola. Ortiz killed himself on September 7, 2020 at his home in Guadalajara, aged 48. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Suicides Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican stage actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican singers Category:Mexican businesspeople Category:Mexican television presenters
title: Xavier Ortiz
